title: Why am I not in a game yet o.o
body:
My queue timer has been 10+ minutes and I still havent found a match, estimated time is 1:23
????????????????????????
https://postimg.org/image/81ypepodh/

replies.body: Did this happen more than once or was this just this one time?
happened 3 times, although I logged out, logged in again and it seemed to work fine

Gotcha. So when I see this pop-up, it's usually because there's a *poor connection* to the PvP.net service, which is the service that delivers these notifications. I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure you aren't running any conflicting network settings locally.

Let me know if those steps improved this situation.
